title: unspecified error 0%
body: I got a new computer yesterday I downloaded league it was perfectly fine. I logged back on yesterday and it said ther was a problem patching so I uninstalled league then redownloaded league and it said unspecified error at 0%. someone please help me. I built this new computer just to play league lol and I cant play it anymore pls help

replies.body:
I've been having the same error too, which a new computer as well! I've tried all the permissions things and it didn't work, unfortunately.

I found this error in the logs:
Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'tagName' of null http://riot:T0tvnyzpzePQpLuuACBAYg@127.0.0.1:57946/static/bundle-vendor-lib/public/ping/ping.js:7
everything is uip to date and all my permissions are good. people keep telling me that theres this "S_OK" file in RADS. I try to rename the file because for me its just S_OK. it still doesn't work/

Congrats on your new rig!  Make sure that your OS is up to date so it has all necessary products!  If the issue persists then your settings might be a bit too restricting and not allowing your game files to be read.  You'll want to run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get that restored.  I hope that helps!
